RB.name: Random Bias
RB.strategy: Chooses 1 randomly based on a probability or bias

WSLS.name: Win-stay, lose-switch
WSLS.strategy: If it win it chooses the same option again, if it lose it change to another

TFT.name: Tit-for-Tat
TFT.strategy: Intended the prisoners dilemma. It starts out cooperating and then simply copies it opponents action.

TOM.name: Theory of Mind
TOM.strategy: Recursively estimated its opponent choice probability and model parameters.
